About Us | SCI-T

About Us

Welcome to SCI-T, where we believe collaboration drives progress and innovation. Our platform is dedicated to fostering open science projects and providing an ecosystem for researchers, innovators, and enthusiasts to work together and share their discoveries with the world.

Our Mission

At SCI-T, our mission is to advance science by promoting transparency, collaboration, and accessibility. We support both open science initiatives and private projects, empowering individuals and teams to make meaningful contributions to their fields while gaining recognition for their efforts.

SCI-T Points System

To motivate and recognize contributions, we have developed a Points System that rewards participants for their involvement in projects and activities:

Open Science Projects

  • +2 points: For participating in and completing an open science project.
  • +3 points: For leading an open science project to completion.
  • +1 point: For all team members who generate and present monthly reports.
  • +3 points: For creating a scientific article at the project's conclusion.
  • +4 points: For publishing the scientific article in a peer-reviewed journal.
  • +3 points: For writing a science communication article about the project on our platform.

Private Projects

Private projects are welcome but have slightly different incentives:

  • 1 point less: For each activity compared to open science projects.
  • Mandatory: Once the final product is published in a journal of choice, a science communication article must be created on our platform.

Note: For private projects, reports will not be published and will remain strictly confidential.

Reports and Final Products

At SCI-T, we encourage transparency and knowledge sharing:

  • Reports from open science groups will be published on our platform for the community to learn and benefit from their progress.
  • The final product of the project will also be shared as an open resource.

We recommend that groups produce a scientific article based on their project, which can:

  1. Be published in a scientific journal as a formal contribution.
  2. Generate a science communication article on SCI-T, including a hyperlink to the published scientific article for greater visibility.

For private projects, reports will not be shared, maintaining full confidentiality. However, upon final product publication, a science communication article must be published on our platform.

We encourage authors to acknowledge SCI-T in their scientific articles for inspiring and supporting these projects.

Groups at SCI-T

We welcome and support various types of groups:

  • Student groups
  • Research groups
  • Private groups

When a group proposes a project, it will be directly assigned to the proposing group for better management and organization. Additionally, active groups will earn:

  • 1 passive point per month: For maintaining consistent activity, regardless of ongoing projects.

Future Opportunities

SCI-T not only recognizes your current efforts but also projects these into the future:

  • Connecting with Companies: We are working to establish partnerships with scientific and technological companies.
  • Your Score Matters: In the near future, your SCI-T score will play an important role when applying for jobs, helping companies evaluate your experience, skills, and commitment based on your projects and achievements on our platform.

Why Join SCI-T?

  • Recognition and Growth: Earn points to showcase your scientific contributions.
  • Collaboration: Work with like-minded individuals across various disciplines.
  • Impact: Share your findings with the community and advance knowledge.
  • Future Opportunities: Your performance here could open doors to job opportunities with leading companies.
  • Flexibility: Choose between open science or private projects, depending on your goals.
  • Group Support: Register your group and work together while enjoying SCI-T’s recognition and benefits.
  • Visibility and Acknowledgment: Publish reports and results to highlight your achievements in the scientific community and beyond.

Join the Movement

Become part of a community that values your ideas and contributions. Whether you're an experienced researcher, a student, or a science enthusiast, there’s a place for you at SCI-T. Let’s drive progress together!
